title: Remove blur background from text lines

requirements.summary: Remove all blur backgrounds from text lines in the memories page, ensuring text appears on a fully transparent or solid background without any blur effect
acceptanceCriteria: Text lines have no blur effect on their backgrounds
Text remains readable against the photo collage
All text styling (color, size, positioning) is preserved

file_operations.description: Remove backdrop-blur classes and blur-related CSS from the memory captions overlay container. Replace with either fully transparent background or solid background that maintains text readability against the photo collage. Preserve all existing text styling including color, font size, and positioning.
Remove any custom CSS rules that apply blur effects to elements within the memories page. Ensure no global styles are adding backdrop-blur or filter blur to text containers.
